about_the_game:
The faint, flickering torchlight is your only ally in this demonic abyss. It, and the cold, sturdy steel in your hand, are all that protect you from the denizens of the surrounding darkness. You will know the true meaning of fear as you hear the cries of twisted abominations encircling you in the inky blackness. Your only hope is to collect and call on the unearthly powers of the Deck and to become an unstoppable force. 

You are an artifact hunter, a seeker and purveyor of rare, magical relics. Your profession takes you into some of the darkest and most dangerous recesses of existence. The ultimate goal of your search is the fabled Deck of Darkness, an incredibly potent arcane artifact said to grant it's bearer immortality… for a price. Survive long enough and you will face your terrifying destiny in the dungeon's darkest depths.

Deck of Darkness: Infernal Depths is an atmospheric, dark fantasy horror action role-playing game. Being a roguelike dungeon crawler, every playthrough will be unique. Each level has it's own theme and monsters, which become more fearsome as you go deeper.

Most dungeon crawlers are brightly lit cakewalks compared to this one. Luckily, the powers of the Deck will make you a formidable foe indeed.

content_descriptors.notes: In Deck of Darkness: Infernal Depths there is low-resolution fantasy violence with lots of blood shown.
